keywords.name: Concealable
keywords.description: May be hidden easily. +1 bonus die to Subterfuge if trying to conceal this weapon.

keywords.name: Piercing X
keywords.description: Ignores X points of armor protection.

keywords.name: Point Blank
keywords.description: Ignore penalty die from shooting at Melee or Near range. At Melee range, gain Piercing 2.

keywords.name: Smart-Linked
keywords.description: Requires Ammo (SMART); negate one level of cover (Full -> Partial; Partial negated). Target must be visible and bullets must have a path.

keywords.name: Stun X
keywords.description: Deals no damage, but forces target to roll Toughness (DC 6 + X) or be Stunned for X rounds.

keywords.name: Bullet Spray
keywords.description: Requires at least half ammo available. Targets multiple enemies in a cone; depletes remaining ammo; deals reduced damage; does friendly fire. Make a single attack roll and compare it against the DC of each target in the spray zone (including cover bonuses). Each hit deals -1 damage.

keywords.name: Shredding X
keywords.description: If damage exceeds armour’s protection value, reduce armour’s durability by X.

keywords.name: Area (X)
keywords.description: Deals damage to all targets at X distance or closer.

keywords.name: Thrown
keywords.description: Weapon may be thrown without suffering a penalty die.

keywords.name: Grenade
keywords.description: Requires (and uses up) a grenade item, applying the effects and any damage the grenade deals upon a hit. Additionally, deals this weapon’s damage to the target from the impact. A failure to hit by 3 or less still grants the effect of the grenade used, but does not deal this weapon’s damage.

keywords.name: Toxin (X)
keywords.description: Apply 1 level of X toxin upon successful attack.
